modName: One-Key Switching between XBOX360 Controller And Keyboard
summary: One-Key Switching between XBOX360 Controller And Keyboard (Both can active at the same time) by ????(creator),cmd
descriptionHtml:
One-Key Switching between XBOX360 Controller And Keyboard (Both can active at the same time) by ????(creator),cmd

orignal link: http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-3574969-1-1.html

Release Notes:
Temporary 1.0, may be updated in the future.
One-Key Switching tested with both original wired and wireless xbox360 Controller, both perfectly work.

Recommended work with original wired xbox360 Controller with xbox 360 keyboard (Xbox Accessory) on Keyboard Mode for a better performance.

Bugs Known: May not work with some versions (Tested and work in 1.7.7.0 and 1.8.151.1, assume the values did not modify in different version, it should work on all versions)

Installation and description:
Unzip to any directory, start the program and start the game
press \"HOME\" to switch on/off controller mode (Don\'t forget to trun on vibration option in game setting)
press \"END\" to switch on/off control of the mouse
press \"INSERT\" to switch on/off controller and keyboard mode (You can use the controller and keyboard hotkey, under this mode the mouse cannot be used, but you can use keyboard hotkey such as C for running)

2012-11-29 17:49:19 updated with \"LB\"+\"A\" for running under controller and keyboard mode
author: fenglingyueying creator and cmd
